Subjects concerning: 
 
- urban policies (waste management, sustainable development, mobility...). Urban intergroup.

customers: Brussels Times# European Federation of Osteopaths# Forum for Osteopathic Regulation in Europe
goals__remit: We are a Belgian limited company working as management and public affairs consultants. We dedicate ourselves in representing various clients from various sectors (healthcare, food and nutrition, environment, sustainable development...). We support our clients in organizing events (press conferences, seminars,...) and are led to make frequent visits to the European Parliament to monitor EU policy making for our clients.
